definition: namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near

sentences.english: The quality and stability of white shrimp(Penaeus vannamei) product was studied and refined.
sentences.chinese: 研究并提高南美白对虾即食加工制品品质和贮藏性。

sentences.english: A process for preparing ready-to-eat retort pouch oyster using oysters (Crassostrea talienwhanensis Crosse) as material was developed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 以大连湾长牡蛎为原料，开发即食牡蛎软罐头。

sentences.english: Mix ground black sesame with sugar become the fillings.
sentences.chinese: 把即食黑芝麻碎加入砂糖搅拌，做成馅料。

sentences.english: Pour the sachet's content into a cup.
sentences.chinese: 将一包雅妍即食银耳润颜甜品倒入杯中。

sentences.english: It is suitable for ready-to-eat meals and convenience foods such as soups, stews and pasta.
sentences.chinese: 它适用于即食餐和方便食品，如汤，炖肉和面食。

sentences.english: The effect of soaking processing on the texture of instant Channel catfish skin was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了浸泡工艺对即食型斑点叉尾𫚔鱼皮质构的影响。

sentences.english: Which type of opinion leader do you prefer in Nissin Advertisement?
sentences.chinese: 你认为日清即食面应选择哪一类代言人作宣传？

sentences.english: Please choose your favorite instant noodles.
sentences.chinese: 请选出你所喜爱的即食面品牌。

sentences.english: Therefore, the optimum processing for preserving convenient bacon with Nisin has been determined.
sentences.chinese: 找出了用乳酸链球菌素保藏即食腊肉的最佳工艺条件。

sentences.english: An extrusion cooked cereal product in ready-to-eat form.
sentences.chinese: 一种即食型挤出蒸煮谷类制品。

definition: ingredients (in a cooking recipe)/to mix materials according to directions
raw materials for making soup/packaged soup mix
way of eating/how something is eaten/how a dish is prepared/the way a dish is to be cooked
